name: together-forever-theme
description: Together Forever WordPress child theme with SCSS support

scripts.build:css: sass scss/root.scss css/root.css --style=compressed --source-map && sass scss/main.scss css/main.css --style=compressed --source-map
scripts.watch:css: sass scss/root.scss css/root.css --watch --style=expanded --source-map & sass scss/main.scss css/main.css --watch --style=expanded --source-map

author: Forever Together Team
